name: Bialgebra.TensorProduct.counit_eq_algHom_toLinearMap
initialProofState:
R : Type u_1
A : Type u_2
B : Type u_3
inst✝⁴ : CommRing R
inst✝³ : Ring A
inst✝² : Ring B
inst✝¹ : Bialgebra R A
inst✝ : Bialgebra R B
⊢ Eq CoalgebraStruct.counit ((Algebra.TensorProduct.lmul' R).comp (Algebra.TensorProduct.map (Bialgebra.counitAlgHom R A) (Bialgebra.counitAlgHom R B))).toLinearMap
decl:
lemma counit_eq_algHom_toLinearMap :
    Coalgebra.counit (R := R) (A := A ⊗[R] B) =
      ((Algebra.TensorProduct.lmul' R).comp (Algebra.TensorProduct.map
      (Bialgebra.counitAlgHom R A) (Bialgebra.counitAlgHom R B))).toLinearMap := by
  rfl

name: Bialgebra.TensorProduct.comul_eq_algHom_toLinearMap
initialProofState:
R : Type u_1
A : Type u_2
B : Type u_3
inst✝⁴ : CommRing R
inst✝³ : Ring A
inst✝² : Ring B
inst✝¹ : Bialgebra R A
inst✝ : Bialgebra R B
⊢ Eq CoalgebraStruct.comul ((↑(Algebra.TensorProduct.tensorTensorTensorComm R A A B B)).comp (Algebra.TensorProduct.map (Bialgebra.comulAlgHom R A) (Bialgebra.comulAlgHom R B))).toLinearMap
decl:
lemma comul_eq_algHom_toLinearMap :
    Coalgebra.comul (R := R) (A := A ⊗[R] B) =
      ((Algebra.TensorProduct.tensorTensorTensorComm R A A B B).toAlgHom.comp
      (Algebra.TensorProduct.map (Bialgebra.comulAlgHom R A)
      (Bialgebra.comulAlgHom R B))).toLinearMap := by
  rfl

name: Bialgebra.TensorProduct.map_tmul
initialProofState:
R A B C D : Type u
inst✝⁸ : CommRing R
inst✝⁷ : Ring A
inst✝⁶ : Ring B
inst✝⁵ : Ring C
inst✝⁴ : Ring D
inst✝³ : Bialgebra R A
inst✝² : Bialgebra R B
inst✝¹ : Bialgebra R C
inst✝ : Bialgebra R D
f : BialgHom R A B
g : BialgHom R C D
x : A
y : C
⊢ Eq ((Bialgebra.TensorProduct.map f g) (TensorProduct.tmul R x y)) (TensorProduct.tmul R (f x) (g y))
decl:
@[simp]
theorem map_tmul (f : A →ₐc[R] B) (g : C →ₐc[R] D) (x : A) (y : C) :
    map f g (x ⊗ₜ y) = f x ⊗ₜ g y :=
  rfl

inst✝ : Bialgebra R D
f : BialgHom R A B
g : BialgHom R C D
⊢ Eq (↑(Bialgebra.TensorProduct.map f g)) (Coalgebra.TensorProduct.map ↑f ↑g)
decl:
@[simp]
theorem map_toCoalgHom (f : A →ₐc[R] B) (g : C →ₐc[R] D) :
    map f g = Coalgebra.TensorProduct.map (f : A →ₗc[R] B) (g : C →ₗc[R] D) := rfl

⊢ Eq (↑(Bialgebra.TensorProduct.map f g)) (Algebra.TensorProduct.map ↑f ↑g)
decl:
@[simp]
theorem map_toAlgHom (f : A →ₐc[R] B) (g : C →ₐc[R] D) :
    (map f g : A ⊗[R] C →ₐ[R] B ⊗[R] D) =
      Algebra.TensorProduct.map (f : A →ₐ[R] B) (g : C →ₐ[R] D) :=
  rfl

name: Bialgebra.TensorProduct.assoc_tmul
initialProofState:
R A B C : Type u
inst✝⁶ : CommRing R
inst✝⁵ : Ring A
inst✝⁴ : Ring B
inst✝³ : Ring C
inst✝² : Bialgebra R A
inst✝¹ : Bialgebra R B
inst✝ : Bialgebra R C
x : A
y : B
z : C
⊢ Eq ((Bialgebra.TensorProduct.assoc R A B C) (TensorProduct.tmul R (TensorProduct.tmul R x y) z)) (TensorProduct.tmul R x (TensorProduct.tmul R y z))
decl:
@[simp]
theorem assoc_tmul (x : A) (y : B) (z : C) :
    Bialgebra.TensorProduct.assoc R A B C ((x ⊗ₜ y) ⊗ₜ z) = x ⊗ₜ (y ⊗ₜ z) :=
  rfl

⊢ Eq ((Bialgebra.TensorProduct.assoc R A B C).symm (TensorProduct.tmul R x (TensorProduct.tmul R y z))) (TensorProduct.tmul R (TensorProduct.tmul R x y) z)
decl:
@[simp]
theorem assoc_symm_tmul (x : A) (y : B) (z : C) :
    (Bialgebra.TensorProduct.assoc R A B C).symm (x ⊗ₜ (y ⊗ₜ z)) = (x ⊗ₜ y) ⊗ₜ z :=
  rfl

name: Bialgebra.TensorProduct.lid_tmul

⊢ Eq ((Bialgebra.TensorProduct.lid R A) (TensorProduct.tmul R r a)) (HSMul.hSMul r a)

decl:
@[simp]
theorem lid_symm_apply (a : A) : (Bialgebra.TensorProduct.lid R A).symm a = 1 ⊗ₜ a := rfl

name: Bialgebra.TensorProduct.coalgebra_rid_eq_algebra_rid_apply
initialProofState:
R A : Type u
inst✝² : CommRing R
inst✝¹ : Ring A
inst✝ : Bialgebra R A
x : TensorProduct R A R
⊢ Eq ((Coalgebra.TensorProduct.rid R A) x) ((Algebra.TensorProduct.rid R R A) x)
decl:
theorem coalgebra_rid_eq_algebra_rid_apply (x : A ⊗[R] R) :
    Coalgebra.TensorProduct.rid R A x = Algebra.TensorProduct.rid R R A x :=
  congr($((TensorProduct.AlgebraTensorModule.rid_eq_rid R A).symm) x)

decl:

    (Bialgebra.TensorProduct.rid R A : A ⊗[R] R ≃ₗc[R] A) = Coalgebra.TensorProduct.rid R A := rfl

name: Bialgebra.TensorProduct.rid_toAlgEquiv
initialProofState:
R A : Type u
inst✝² : CommRing R
inst✝¹ : Ring A
inst✝ : Bialgebra R A
⊢ Eq (↑(Bialgebra.TensorProduct.rid R A)) (Algebra.TensorProduct.rid R R A)
decl:
@[simp]
theorem rid_toAlgEquiv :
    (Bialgebra.TensorProduct.rid R A : A ⊗[R] R ≃ₐ[R] A) = Algebra.TensorProduct.rid R R A := by
  ext x
  exact coalgebra_rid_eq_algebra_rid_apply x
